reviewText: I enjoyed it.. Yellowstone was a vacation my family took when I was a child and was truly a point in my life that had the greatest impact on me.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I have a number of nature videos produced by the BBC Earth people and they are superb blu-ray, such as planet earth, etc. but I'm not sure this is blu-ray quality -- at least it doesn't compare in sharpness to the BBC Earth ones that we love. The topics and footage is good and somewhat enjoyable, but the benchmark has been set high by the BBC Earth folks! I have a blu-ray DVD by them on Yellowstone that IS my # 1 favorite nature DVD of all time. Look for it and get it, you'll love it!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Our entire family enjoyed viewing this dvd and the quality was superb. My mom had visited there and she felt like it was like going there all over again. I am getting the rest of this series and am in love with the idea of visiting these parks..they are on my bucket list now.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Hard to beat the price, and as documentaries go, I'd say this is OK. Not outstanding. A very small percentage of the camera work is oddly shaking, like it was improperly converted from a different frame rate.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This DVD shares a lot.  I've been to Yellowstone once before.  My husband is exited to go for his first time.  Watching this DVD brought back a lot of memories making mewant to go back again!  The photography, narration, and scenery is excellent.  The pilot and photographer take you a long for a ride you would never get to see alone.This is a number one place for photography, sightseeing and enjoyment.  This DVD brings it out!
Title: N/A

reviewText: A very beautiful travel log of Yellowstone. Great photography and excellent narration. I highly recommend for an introduction to our first national park.
